title: Pegasus drogue, hose, boom systems deployed (USAF - United States Air Force)
text: ( Source : USAF - United States Air Force ) WRIGHT-PATTERSON AIR FORCE BASE , Ohio ( AFNS ) -- The KC-46A Pegasus notched another success this week when the systems at the heart of aerial refueling were demonstrated on EMD-2 with the deployment
